item.title: It's not waste, it's learning
item.description: In one my my rare weekends at home, I found myself on a pottery course (this is the sort of thing that happens when you’re a “yes” person).

item.title: Certifiction
item.description: From spellfecker today:Certifiction (n.) : a professional endorsement which states only that the holder had the money to pay for the exam.…which reminded me of this debate, particularly the first comment.
